column4: how to fix this warning?? --> libGL warning: 3D driver claims to not support visual 0x4b
That error is fine, it is because you are using the open source reverse engineered ATI drivers.
sometimes.. after some period of using compiz/aiglx, my X will crashed automaticaly.. what cause that to happen?
Try #ubuntu-xgl for more help with beryl / compiz issues.
